name: DataTransferItem
description: The DataTransferItem object represents one drag data item. During a drag operation, each drag event has a dataTransfer property which contains a list of drag data items. Each item in the list is a DataTransferItem object.

members.name: DataTransferItem.kind
members.description: The kind of drag data item, string or file.

parameters.name: 'file'
parameters.description: If the drag data item is a file.

parameters.name: 'string'
parameters.description: If the kind of drag data item is a plain Unicode string.

members.name: DataTransferItem.type
members.description: The drag data item's type, typically a MIME type.

members.name: DataTransferItem.getAsFile()
members.description: Returns the File object associated with the drag data item (or null if the drag item is not a file).

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: If the drag data item is a file, a File object is returned; otherwise null is returned.

members.name: DataTransferItem.getAsString()
members.description: Invokes the specified callback with the drag data item string as its argument.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: A callback function that has access to the data transfer item's string data. See Callback below for details.

parameters.name: DOMString
parameters.description: The drag data item's string data.

members.name: DataTransferItem.webkitGetAsEntry()
members.description: Returns an object based on FileSystemEntry representing the selected file's entry in its file system. This will generally be either a FileSystemFileEntry or FileSystemDirectoryEntry object.
